title: However, before permitting / granting TDR / DRC for encumbered land, project implementing authority shall separately certify the area of land which are vacant and the area of land under encumbrance alongwith detail as per the joint measurement survey carried out in this respect with the city survey officer
clause_text: However, before permitting / granting TDR / DRC for encumbered land, project implementing authority shall separately certify the area of land which are vacant and the area of land under encumbrance alongwith detail as per the joint measurement survey carried out in this respect with the city survey officer. The area of vacant land and land under part encumbrance shall be clearly distinguished and demarcated, otherwise the land under part encumbrance shall be treated as fully encumbered land.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
